overview_description.description: Dotz Nano is concentrated on creating, manufacturing, and marketing innovative materials for solutions in tagging, tracing, and verification, and for diagnostics. They offer validotz, biodotz, fluorensic, and inspec among their goods. The oil and gas business, anti-counterfeiting, brand and reputation protection, liquids tagging, lubricants and def authentication, polymers tagging, and bio-imaging are just a few of the areas for which their devices provide answers.

about_short_description.short_description: Dotz Nano develops and markets carbon-based materials.

product.name: Carbon Capture Technology
product.description: A solid and porous carbon sorbent designed to capture CO2, using plastic waste as the primary raw material.

product.name: Monitoring and Authentication
product.description: A solution combining graphene and carbon-based materials with detectors, a mobile app, and cloud software for product authentication, traceability, and anti-alteration.

product.name: Validotz
product.description: Proprietary optical taggants embedded in products during production for brand protection and product liability.

product.name: InSpec
product.description: Hand-held devices that scan products at a special optical wavelength to create a unique signature for real-time product information.

product.name: Dotz Cloud-based Management Platform
product.description: A platform that aggregates information from the mobile app to provide a comprehensive view of the value chain for analysis and optimization.

identifier.value: Graphene Quantum Dots (GQDs) and Carbon Dots (CDs)

product.name: Graphene Quantum Dots (GQDs) and Carbon Dots (CDs)
product.description: Nanoscale particles with tunable photoluminescence, used in various applications including biomedical and product authentication.
